epPartPlanningActivitiesToggleCommandToo: Review part planning operation for its activities, NC program and Work Instructions.
noActivities: There are no activities for the selected operation.
epPartPlanningPasteItemDescription: Paste a material to be used in the operation.
incorrectOperationType: This type of operation is not supported in part planning activities panel.
selectProcessOrOperation: Select a process or an operation to view its activities.
